title: Buns and Basketball (feat. Brian Six & Ryan Shaner)
description:
Brian Six and Ryan Shaner join The Bonfire to watch "Buns and Basketball" and make fun of Johnny Depp's musical abilities!

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire

Follow us on all social media @TheBonfireXM
